name: The Moose's Video Game
description: Not too long ago, there was a moose named Oscar Rupert Reginald, and he wanted to go south for the winter. Along his journey, he experienced the big city, strong weather, and was even chased! The Moose was chased by a hunter named Kevin. It is your job to help the Moose elude Kevin and to make it safely to your friends in Florida.
